PerfectNetExp.abs: caryophylleneoxide 石竹烯氧化物, caryophyllidae 石竹亚纲, caryophylleous 石竹褐色的

means.word_mean: 1. a group of families of mostly flowers having basal or free-central placentation and trinucleate pollen (binucleate pollen is commoner in flowering plants); contains 14 families including: Caryophyllaceae (carnations and pinks); Aizoaceae; Amaranthaceae;
